meanings.definition: relating to the point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is farthest from the earth
meanings.sent1: The spacecraft reached its apogean position, far away from our planet.
meanings.sent2: The apogean distance between the moon and the earth is quite vast.
meanings.sent3: The alien claimed the apogean spot in the sky for its intergalactic picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared to an apogean height, touching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The apogean moment of the eclipse left spectators in awe of the universe's vastness.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the highest point or culmination
meanings.sent1: The mountain climber finally reached the apogean peak after a long journey.
meanings.sent2: His career reached an apogean level when he won the prestigious award.
meanings.sent3: The apogean cake at the party was so tall, it almost touched the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice reached an apogean pitch that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The apogean moment of the play was the unexpected plot twist that left everyone speechless.
